title: Short-term Intensive Course on Inquiry-based Mathematics Learning Design: Application to the Language Domain

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Concepts and Fundamental Language Learning Competencies
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service elementary educators and education job seekers to learn strategies integrating mathematical inquiry methods into language education. Operated in a limited technological environment centered on smartphones, with learning outcomes measured through project-based assessment.

learning_goals: Learners can design at least three strategies to apply a math inquiry-based learning model to language education contexts.
Learners can explain methods to analyze learnersâ€™ mathematical attitudes (self-efficacy, perceived usefulness) through inquiry-based learning activities.
Learners can complete inquiry-based learning projects and present outcomes using smartphone-based tools in blended environments.

resources: Case Study Materials (Language-Mathematics Integrated Education Example)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
